title: Feature Lifecycle Management
description: Tracks the lifecycle of all product features from proposal to completion.

items.description: A reference to a feature artifact. It acts as a pointer in the manifest to the actual feature file.

status.description: The current high-level status of the feature.

summary.description: A brief, one-line summary of the feature's purpose.

path.description: The relative file path to the feature's detailed markdown document from the `core-system` root.
